website_summaries.verdict: High-quality sound for a reasonable price.
pros: A nice wireless range of 33 feet means you don't have to stay right next to your phone
Stereo sound means you hear your music how it was intended
Silicone ear hooks provide a secure fit
cons: Some users find this design bulky for smaller ears

customer_reviews.title: Great value on price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews on these headphones which were overwhelmingly positive and up to this point, they have delivered. -First of all it comes with a case that you can zip up and keep them safe in, which is great as I usually just throw them in my gym bag -The quality and look of them of them is great. They look and feel like a much more expensive pair of headphones -It was super easy and FAST to connect to my phone. Fastest Bluetooth headphones I’ve had. -The only constructive feedback I have is that it isn’t as loud as other headphones but the quality of the sound is great and makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Espriu

customer_reviews.title: Great value, wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great Headset for the money. Mids and vocals are clear and crisp (very impressive). The highs get bad esp when max volume. Bass are not bad, not great, but enough. Overall about the sound, im impressed by the sounds in the mids and vocals, like ive never experienced it before. Just dont listen on max volume, which is not a biggy for me. And anither awesome part is that google assistant works on this!!
customer_reviews.author: Audiophillic

customer_reviews.title: Stayed in my faceholes
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly the headphones I was looking for. They stay in my ears when I go to the gym, and get sweaty. Water resistance is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Why would you buy Beats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Beats, and have sent them back to Apple 3x.... twice under warranty and once my expense (sweat proof, NO WAY). I order these to have as backups. After using them a few times when my Beats were getting repaired/replaced - I told myself "I should have bought these to begin with!" For the price point and quality, you can't beat them! A few notes on the product: the eat hooks are a little flexible but works, also there's a slight rattle coming from the buttons on the right ear piece. Not so annoying that I believe they need to replaced at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these for about 3-4 weeks. They sound excellent and stay on my ears without any fiddling. The over-ear hooks are very soft so they don’t bother my ears at all. They always connect to my phone and never drop. I have yet to run down the battery even after being on a conference call for three hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Friddell

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Inbox therapy brought me here and was the reason I bought these. My options were either to buy these or air pods and I’m glad these worked out. I’m not a huge fan of headphones with the tips on them but these definitely are a game changer. My only complaint was that it took a bit longer than expected but no real complaints. Battery is nice, the features for play/pause & skip/volume is a little different but super easy. I’ve recommended this to everyone who is interested in wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Watson

customer_reviews.title: When talking to people using these they work well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for the past couple of weeks and they work great People that I talk to like the sound Only drawback seems that the noise canceling feature does not work the best
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sheltrow

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got these a couple weeks ago, they've gotten wet, no problems. I seat a LOT, no problems. Automatically connect when I turn them on, fit comfortably in my ears, seem big when you look at them but feel like nothing when I'm wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wireless headphones, love the bass!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to Mpow for unexpectedly sending me a direct replacement! The headphones work great, have excellent sound quality and the new headphones work perfectly while I’m exercising. No issues here. Thank you, Mpow for your great and prompt customer service! It’s such a relief to have a high quality pair of wireless headphones (especially ones that stay in place while running!) without having to drop a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several wireless earphones in the past few months. So far these are very good. The price was the best part. But the sound quality is excellent. And I haven't gotten any complaints about sound quality when I speak on the phone as I have with other devices. Definitely worth buy. And for the price, it's a win win. There is a YouTube video that made me decide to check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Quintessa D.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair because my wife already had one, and I had been using hers. This style is little better, more comfortable on the ears. Sound is still great. Added bonus are all of the size options for earpieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a YES
customer_reviews.text: The bass knocks on these. These are the best budget headphones hands down. In my humble opinion, they're better or on par with Beats sound quality. This company delivers. What they lack in marketing they make up in quality performance. If you don't believe me, look up any YouTube video about these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon R Blacksher

customer_reviews.title: Legit!
customer_reviews.text: Every feature they promise works. It just works. The sound is awesome for the price. I fully expected to not have a high volume, but these crank up! The buttons are clicky and reactive. Summoning Google Assistant is a snap. The range is nice. No disruption in connection with my phone is different pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless earphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair because I had borrowed my sister's and loved how convenient they are to use. I like that they are connected so I don't lose one(did with the other type of wireless). They fit very comfortably once you put the correct size cover which is easy as you get various sizes. Sound quality and volume are great and controls are very easy to understand and use. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M

customer_reviews.title: Good value, convenient, comfortable, just don't expect driving bass
customer_reviews.text: Came charged, paired immediately with no fuss, super comfy. Feels high enough quality that they'll last you so long as you take decent care of them. Simple interface to use even while exercising, and they won't fall out no matter how hard I shake my head!
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bargain for moderate users on the move.
customer_reviews.text: I don't dish out 5 star ratings lightly, but -- while audiophiles probably won't sing their praises in terms of sound -- I couldn't be more impressed for the price. I've purchased headsets for thrice the price with comparable performance and a third the portability. The fit and feel is easy to adjust, comfortable, and secure. Top it all off with the sturdy travel case which includes a convenient internal pouch for charging cable and interchangeable earbuds and you've got yourself a steal of a deal. This one's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. Great price! Only complaint is that battery indicator is inaccurate. Your battery is go from 30percent to zero.
customer_reviews.author: Cop_that

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this purchase. My boyfriend bought the original mpow headphones in red & black, the same time I bought my beats x - his lasted longer than mine which broke apart. And during each workout his battery lasted longer weekly than mine. The sound seems twice as deeper/louder than beats also. Mostly I like how the cord doesn’t rest on your neck & hangs behind the head instead. So happy mpow came out with this rose pink color in the updated version & I expect them to last much longer! Only thing is I wish the zipper case matched with pink also but still a nice feature regardless. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: tay p

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless ear buds!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I bought, liked the first so much. Great battery life! Very comfortable, great for workouts, and call features easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TRiP

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade is worse?!?! 3 times return customer dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Comparing these to my previous pair of mpow flame (the original) The battery life is much better the chord is better the bluetooth connectivity is better but the sound quality?!? WORSE! There's the ever present static that won't go away whenever there's audio input. I did a sanity test compared to the originals (which the left earbud broke, yay) and the originals didn't have the static! This company seems to have seriously quality problems. They can go from awesome, to broke, sometimes they have static, sometimes not... what a bunch of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Easily the Best Cheap Earphones
customer_reviews.text: I have bought most the cheap earphones Amazon and MPOW's seem the most durable and best quality. Most of them will stop working after a period of time and I have 10 sets that won't take a charge anymore and none are MPOW's. They also have the best ergonomically fitting earpiece. That's important. I should have started with that. They are as easy to lose as the rest, I'm afraid. Oh, they don't automatically turn coffin all cases so remember to power them down. Excellent battery life. I have forgot to power them down several times and they worked fine for the couple hours I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDawg88

customer_reviews.title: Great for running, hiking, walking around inside, anything!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my original mpows, the 2s are a huge step up. Easier to pair, more comfortable / better fitting. The bad: I don't have quite the same bass, but I probably should spend more time fitting the earbuds. My phone displays a battery percentage below the Bluetooth icon. This seems to go from 100%, 90%, 30%, dead. Better than nothing, but not the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Weak Bass.
customer_reviews.text: Like many of the Bluetooth earbuds on Amazon, these appear to be made in the same factory with the same parts and the same software. They also have lots of 5* reviews that seem to be posted by the same person or bot or at least by people who received the product at no cost We give these earbuds 3* because the bass sound is weak. OK for telephone use because the treble is good for voice but not very good for music. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stopped working entirely. What a useless product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for three weeks and they will not pair anymore. I've tried multiple devices. The headphones are charged, so it's not a battery issue. I checked to see if I was turning it on correctly. The problem is with the headphones, and a pair of headphones like this is absolutely useless without the Bluetooth functioning. I'm very disappointed that this product didn't live up to the hype, and will be buying from your competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Teyss

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: Legit bad quality and a lot of false advertisement ..battery life is no where close and there is no bass i wanted to upgrade and amazon wants to go without headphones while they fix this...i shouldn't have to go without because of the add lied about the features and quality please fix this i bought multiple pairs to legit not use them i want a upgrade...
customer_reviews.author: HealzPleaze

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound....Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great set of Headphones Second pair...First pair died after seven months...So either because I was using a different USB cord or thts just how long they last...Either way get the Warranty...
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: Buy Already!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy at such a low price! I haven't worked out with these yet, but I did test them out... Stays in place...I jumped around and head banged a little bit in my livingroom! LOL! Great sound, I didn't have to turn volume all the way up to receive great sound. Cancels outside noise so good that my newborn was laying on the seat by me and I couldn't even hear her fussing!!! Hahaha! Oops! I got the Rose Gold and they are super stylish. Nice carrying case and lots of buds accessories.
customer_reviews.author: MawraYah Yahawadah

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They fit great. Sound quality is awesome. They come with a convenient carry case.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - don't buy these if you plan on using these often
customer_reviews.text: Update: As soon as I left a review and seller feedback customer service reached out immediately and compensated me. Furthermore, they went as far as to replace them with another headset they thought I would like more without even telling me. They really care about their customers and reputation, which not a lot of sellers can honestly say. They often experience connection issues and are not built or designed very well. Using the power/pause/play button drives the earbuds into your ear and is very painful to use and are generally uncomfortable after a couple of hours. All in all, they're decent for ~$20, but if you're looking for a pair of everday, all-day use, invest accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Marco De Paulis

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life and Noise Isolation
customer_reviews.text: Bass is adequate. Not over powering. For me the noise isolation is just right. You can hear is someone shouts and you don’t have to have the headphones cranked up. I personally use the Medium sized silicone ear pieces and fins. You may have to go up or down. So far so good ( Fantastic Value ).
customer_reviews.author: Misterpix344

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and comfortable. Use at the gym with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Far above my expectations, they fit great, soundquality is unbelievable and the volume can go way up but it's not needed. Compared to other headphones where you sometimes miss that bit of boost in volume.
customer_reviews.author: Bas

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use my Bluetooth for phone calls and listening to shows at night. The music quality is not as important to me. Callers say they hear me well, no strange sounds. The battery last a surprisingly long time. I don’t use it for workouts so I can’t comment on that. I can leave my phone in the house and go further away from my phone than with any other head set I have owned. The only thing I struggle with is if I put them in my pocket the rubber ear plug cover comes off. I haven’t lost them yet but I own the pink ones and I can’t find pink ear replacements for them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an earlier Mpow headphone, at my daughter's recommendation. It was excellent, but the battery life was somewhat limited to about 4-5 hours. That wasn't enough for an upcoming trip, so I researched and finally concluded that the Flame 2 was an apparent improvement. It turns out to definitely be! The sound is really good and clear and the battery life is something on the order of 12 hours. The fit of the unit is also quite good and helps to really curtail extraneous noises. We're very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stan L. Riggin

customer_reviews.title: Optional Foam Buds?? Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Similar to my other Mpow headset that I got last year. Husband raved about these, so I decided to get myself a set as well. Improved is the tilting down on the sides. It catches my words better than the other headsets I've had before. Also: FOAM ear buds!! They can be changed out for the regular rubber ear buds, but I've always been partial to the foam. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Good bluetooth earbuds for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like them. Work great for work. Battery life also is very good for what you are paying. Would do again.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working one week outside of the one month Amazon warranty window 👎
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I did not listen to other reviews that had to deal with these earbuds failing. This purchase was the classic case of wanting this good deal to be an effective purchase, which it was not, as of the point they quit working i.e. they won't turn on. They worked fine during my last workout, I charged them when finished and put them in the carrying case for my next workout a few days later. While at the gym I attempted to turn them on and nothing. While they worked, they were OK quality for ~$20 cost. Given their failure, an not an isolated one at that, they are not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Skully

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound. As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good and easy to pair and operate. Just too bulky for bikers. Helmet won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Thenny Dar

customer_reviews.title: Static
customer_reviews.text: **Update: Company reached out and sent me a second pair which was also defective and caused static in my ears. They then sent me an outdated version of another headset that was so stiff it felt like it was squeezing my head. A for effort but I haven't been satisfied with any of their products. Started out well but after a couple weeks I started to get a static noise in one of the ear buds when I tried to hold the buttons down to switch songs. Kind of disappointed in these
customer_reviews.author: a2cool

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds don't have equal volume and they are really loose in the ear and fall out.
customer_reviews.text: The worst part is listening to earbuds that have different level of volumes on each side. I cannot fix this, also, I tried every one of the ear pieces that they sent and the headset never fit totally right, the earpieces seem bulky and kind of fit weirdly. However, even if they did fit correctly, as when I manually manipulate them to stay in my ears, the sound is really off between the two buds. Additionally, pink color is like the color of my skin and it kind of looks, for lack of a better term, weird.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many over the ear earphones for running and working out. Most don't stay put as I am a on the petite side, and I got feed-up with putting them put in my ears over and over and over again. Another pair I tried had a 4 second sound delay from any video feed. Still another broke within 3 months and the replacement lasted even less time. In stark contrast these earphones don't move around or fall out of my ears, so adjusting every few minutes. The sound is crisp and clear with a fabulous battery life. You'd be hard pressed to find better over the ear earphones at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: BdogPound

customer_reviews.title: It was good but stopped working after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in September 2019 and one month later I bought a second one so I can rotate them. I use it about 6 hrs a day. Starting a few days ago I started hearing a crackling noise on the left side of the earbud. I reset the bluetooth connection and it didn't help. Today it died I couldn't turn it back on. It won't charge either. And the light indicator that usually turned red when charging was not on.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred A Natanael

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for less than a year, have been working good for my gym workouts. But today my room nearly caught on fire. I was charging them, a toxic smell filled the room, the headphones melted, battery exploded and fried my usb-c cord. SO BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE*
customer_reviews.text: Changed from 1 star to 4. Company reached out and sent a replacement pair. Took a while but overall a good experience. These are probably great headphones for the price...but sometimes you get what you pay for. One of the memory foam earbud covers arrived to destroyed to be of use. Which is a shame because after test fitting the "good" foam bud cover, it's definitely the ones I would prefer to use over the rubber covers. Quality control seems to be lacking in some regards.
customer_reviews.author: really?

customer_reviews.title: Decent head phones...
customer_reviews.text: for the price, these are pretty decent head phones. I have not had time to try the other size ear pieces, so a different size may work better to stay in my ear (I still have the installed pieces on the headphones, but they come with several different sizes). If those work, the sound quality and noise cancellation would be superb! I haven't time the battery, but I swear I get an insane amount of time on them. A much better value than the over priced headsets with sound that rivals them.
customer_reviews.author: KerryH

customer_reviews.title: A lot of Pros one major Con
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Mpow bluetooth headphones because they were nice cheap alternatives for workouts than the more expensive headphones out there. This set is really good and keeps a lot of what Mpow has done before with their headphones and just give it better bluetooth range, battery life, and design. The major con is that for some reason if I wear my device on my left arm in its running band the bluetooth connection starts to skip really bad. Sometimes it just stops for seconds before resuming the music. I don't know if its because the right headphone has the controls or what but it is an extremely annoying bug.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pairing
customer_reviews.text: I have barely used these. Sometimes I would go at least a week without using and they still Stopped pairing after 4 months. ***update. Company contacted me after seeing my review. They sent me a new pair. No charge. So far it’s working good. Hopefully it will last longer than 4 months. But I was definitely pleased with the customer support I received from company trying to make situation better. Especially since I had already thrown out the last pair and had not bought a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: S.Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these headphones!!!!.... But, this is about the 2nd pair I've bought, first one I didnt put insurance on it, the 2nd one I did... I filed a claim with Assurion, they said it's still under manufacturer warranty. IVE BEEN CHASING AFTER THESE GUYS FOR MORE THAN 2 MONTHS NOW IM GETTING THE RUN AROUND, SENDING TO THEIR TECH SUPPORT VIA EMAIL, AND I HAVENT GOTTEN A WORD BACK YET... WHY DO I HAVE TO GO JUMP THROUGH HOOPS TO GET A REPLACEMENT OR MY MONEY BACK!!! I NEED ADVICE RIGHT NOW TO SEE WHAT FURTHER MATTERS I MUST TAKE TO GO ABOUT THIS!!!! SOS, SOMEONE PLEASE HELP!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Everything great, except it fell apart in under a year.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with most features of this headset. It may not be the highest quality manufacture though because the on / off button broke within a year and I had to throw it away. Therefore, I was disappointed about the short longevity and how easily it fell apart. Is it cheaply made? Perhaps. I decided to give it a second try and this time I will not forget to register the free 2 year warranty. If it breaks again in a year I will be able to have it replaced. Will see what happens.....
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth didn't work past 3 feet...errr!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't walk 3 feet from my phone without losing signal and headphones disconnecting....VERY FRUSTRATING! I had very high hopes... Update: so Mpow kindly sent me a new pair. I haven't tried yet but I found that is amazing customer service do wanted to edit my review a little. All companies should have service like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tonnie J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This headset works very well and has nice battery life. I mostly use them for yard work and talking on phone when doing an exercise walk. Haven't tried them for running yet, but they fit snugly so that shouldn't be an issue either. I can say they seem to be very waterproof though, since I sweat profusely when doing yard work and do the same during a fast exercise walk. No issues at all. Highly recomment.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Move the Antenna!
customer_reviews.text: One fatal flaw on sound quality that every pair of Bluetooth headphones suffer from. The antenna is on the right earbud. I am right handed and have my music on my left wrist. This causes body interference that interrupts the signal making poor sound quality. This would be a five star product if they would simply move the antenna to the left side. It’s a simple thing that would make this or any set of earbuds so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not the MPOWs you know and love.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my 3rd pair of MPOW headphones died. The sound quality was so bad that I ordered a different pair from a different manufacturer the next day. Not sure if I simply received a sub par pair, but not worth the risk for me, since I NEED headphones to survive my weekday commute on public transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeriesha

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price with one qualification
customer_reviews.text: I use these to listen to background music or news while I work so I didn't necessarily need something with top of the line sound quality. They're actually pretty clear though. They also seem well made, come with a few different ear bud sizes and a nice carrying case. I wish that they turned off automatically after a certain time inactive though. Or maybe a way to listen to them while plugged in? IDK. Since I use them at work, I frequently have to take them off to answer a call or talk to a colleague. Sometimes I forget to turn them off so the battery gets depleted quickly and I'm left with no headphones. It's kind of annoying!
customer_reviews.author: WhatI'dGive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for audiobooks
customer_reviews.text: This is my #4 MPow headphones. This set is ideal for audiobooks: the battery life is long, the phones never fall out of the ear, the earhooks are very soft and comfortable. I also use them when exercising and sweating a lot in Florida heat - never had any troubles, they never get damaged by sweat. Here is an update. I was listening to an audiobook while soaking in the Mexican Gulf (the phone was in a waterproof pouch), a large wave hit me and I was underwater for a few seconds, the headphones never failed. Their foam earpieces are VERY comfortable and they block external sounds very efficiently, it's like wearing earplugs that deliver sound too :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: They Are Great!  Then stopped working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 pairs of these over time. My 17 y.o. son & I really enjoy them, the sound quality, different available earbud size and the convenience of being able to just drop them down around one's neck if one needs to stop listening for a moment or for a while. They work great with our Peloton so that I can workout "silently" not disturbing anyone else in the house. Bought my first set in March and they "died" in September. Suddenly they just won't turn on any longer. I had used them every day for 6 months. Did buy 2 more pairs in August. Will see how long they last. The charge does last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model mpow that does its job but sometimes the Bluetooth disconnects. It’s also very stiff and sometimes hurts my ears. This new model is great. It’s very light and comfortable. I always have trouble with keeping ear pods on my left ear. The hook is helpful but very soft and sometimes feel loose. I ran on the treadmill with them and they worked great. Not sure on battery life yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones but stopped working in less than a month, I got a refund.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It connects easily to my phone and to my Laptop. I'm really happy with this headphones and probably will by another one. Update 1: It stopped working today Sep. 3rd, 2019. Less than 1 month from purchase and Amazon can't send me a replacement because the return window closed on Sep. 1st, 2019. So, I contacted the seller with help from Amazon and the seller said they will send a replacement. I will update when I get the replacement. Update 2: I got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: YouTube reviews had me curious, and I had JUST receicved a Skullcandy Xtfree wireless ($50) that did not work. The MPOW Flame2's are SO much better than I honestly expected. I primarily use them for out on the trails mountain biking-and in these first two weeks they have already been through Southern Califonia heat of 115 degrees as well as the rigors of hot and sweaty riding. They stayed secure and sound fantastic! Although I cannot comment on full battery life...I WAS able to get over 6 hours out of a full charge (and still had plenty left) before I recharged them. For about $20...they really cannot be beat... I know what I'm getting everyone for xmas THIS YEAR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Unreal quality for the price!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones surprised me big time they have a really rich sound for what they are. I’m an audio engineer and don’t get me wrong they aren’t studio headphones but for listening while working around the house or for a jog hands down I would buy these again. They work especially good when you add an eq for example similar to the one in Spotify then they really come to life and you can get the sound your looking for. I’m also surprised how long the battery lasts even at full volume. Really good buy for the price I would definitely buy them again if these ones go out.
customer_reviews.author: NoBuLLdad1

customer_reviews.title: better on android than on iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Some features that work fine on my wife's android phone do not work as well on my iPhone 8. Her Mpow connects to bluetooth on her android phone automatically, whereas for my Mpow to connect to bluetooth I have to open settings on my iPhone. On both our phones we can pause play by tapping the button on the side, but on her's she can resume play the same way, whereas I have to resume play on the phone itself (tapping the side button a second time accomplishes nothing).
customer_reviews.author: David and Shoshana Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This review for the Mpow Flame-2 Sport Headphones. This set of headphones are what I was looking for. In my opinion they have overall excellent, Quality, they are quick Connecting Bluetooth(5.0), have a long lasting battery(12 hours-give or take), with noise cancelling including a mic and waterproof (IPX) to boot. If I would have written my own wish list for a set of headphones this would be it, so that is what attracted me to these and I am not disappointed. This is my second pair of Mpow the others are just the Flame model. I hope you find my experience helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Soaring Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The headphones had a few hiccups at first when I was trying to pair with my PC, but I think it was more my PC than the headphones. They work better than expected: sound quality is amazing, a little challenge getting used to putting in the ears but nothing a little time won't correct, and that was ok because my ears don't hurt at all after having them in for a couple hours. Thanks @UnboxTherapy for the recommend! They may not have the auto-detect like airpods, but I don't care when it's a tenth of the price I was thinking of paying ($200 for on-sale Powerbeats Pro).
customer_reviews.author: useful_reviews_only

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These have proven to be a great set of headphones so far. They cancel the tv and back ground noise for my caller. Although when I’m the car my caller says the radio comes through as if they’re sitting right there. Not sure why the radio does and not the tv? I remedied this by just turning off the radio during calls. The noise cancelling for music is not wonderful at lower volumes, higher volumes it is better. They fit comfortable to my ears which is hard for me to find in many earphones. Overall the quality is good and I’d purchase again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: KiTTy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few months, but now they won’t pair with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Had really high hopes for these headphones. I bought the original version of these a couple years back and ended up leaving them on an airplane Earlier this year. I went to buy them again and saw that a newer version had been created and so I didn’t hesitate to buy them. They worked fine for a few months but then they just stop pairing with my iPhone. They pair, them unpair and it is SOOOO frustrating. Unfortunately the return window expired at the end of August, and it’s now November. I’d buy them again but just don’t want to be caught up in the same situation.
customer_reviews.author: Zuch

customer_reviews.title: Able to pair with transmitter for TV
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ear buds, I was able to pair with my TV. Sound is good. I am ordering extra small ear bud covers. The small are working but have to be careful they don't fall out. Would be nice if they put extra small in their packs. The package comes with all sorts of extra attachments for the ear pieces. The lateral part helps hold these in place. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: great long battery life
customer_reviews.text: the battery on the one i have lasts between 9 and 11 hours depending on how much you use it. i use mine for audio books while i drive and they tend to last around 10 hours with mostly constant play. only bad thing is these only last about 6 months then the right ear audio goes out, which doesnt make sense since thats the ear where you charge the battery. this happened with the previous model too so i'm thinking its a software or overheating from charging issue. still a great headset for the price and ill be upgrading to the Hd for my next headset because for the price. it lasts 6 months beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Drewilious

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, too soon to tell about battery life. Only reason for 4 stars is the location of the power button. Everytime I put them on, I hit the power button due to its location. Other than super easy to pair with both my work iPhone and my personal cell which is a Samsung Galaxy s7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good, comfortable, sync with phone was quick...
customer_reviews.text: These wireless MPOW headphones look good, they are actually comfortable and synced with my OnePlus 6T very quickly. Unfortunately the most important part of a headphone was seriously neglected. The sound is as bad as a $1.99 bargain bin set of headphones. Actually those might sound a bit better then these do. The price is reasonable for a wireless set of headphones, but I can't forgive the poor sound quality. I am willing to pay another $5-$10 for a seriously improved sounding version of these headphones. I have only had them about 3 hours so no comment on batter life yet. Seriously these might be the worst sounding headphones I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett G. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've found these headphones to work very well. They pair with my phone quickly. The sound quality is fine. There are On/Off verbal notifications through the headset. The charging light is small but visible; I can easily tell when it's charged. The only concern I have is the little flap over the charging port. I suspect it will get detached at some point. Otherwise, this seems a very good product. I had not used for phone calls when I wrote the above. Now I have and, again, it works great. I can hear callers well, and they get my voice with good quality. Still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shager670

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good and more in relation to the price, the highlights of the packaging: 1. Shipping was fast 2. The packaging is excellent and the wearer is very comfortable 3. The extras that it brings serve for each type of person In relation to the equipment and its use: The equipment connects very well to a cell phone or a laptop, automatically and without any problem, the sound is excellent and the meeting cancellation works very well, so much so that you can stop listening to the people around you :-) I recommend this product and it is comparable against other higher priced equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Francois Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enoughy great things about these headphones. Routinely use these for 3-4 hours each night and only need to charge every 3 days or so. Charging is super quick. Sound is loud which is awesome. You can even pair these with 2 devices at a time! Great bass and audio for movies which is what I use them most for. Never had a problem and stay in the ears. If you need to hear the outside word you can use one of the inserts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barr

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only used them for a week but so far they’re amazing! Here’s what I love: 1. Easy to pair to my iPhone 8. 2. They fit so well in my small ears. They stayed in when running and lifting. 3. Lightweight. 4. The sound quality is very good. Worked well even on phone calls outside on a windy day. 5. Battery life is good so far (2.5 hours is the longest I’ve used them. No problems.) 5. These were $17! So inexpensive! I can’t believe I used wired earbuds that never stayed in for so many years. Love these earbuds!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Heywood

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't seem to connect that well
customer_reviews.text: I am using these with an iphone 6S and perhaps that is an issue but I have a lot of dissatisfaction. When I carry my phone in the picket of my jeans while walking, I get a fair amount of cut out when phoning or listening to podcasts. Also when I first turn the headset on and start listening to a podcast for the first few minutes (3-4 but it seems forever), I hear an occasional higher pitched beep like some kind of error. I find them comfortable enough and easy enough to charge. There battery life seems good but with the problems I have had I usually don't leave them on long enough to really test
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with these wireless bluetooth headphones from MPOW. The directions lost a little in translation, but a little trial and error and they were simple to setup, pair with my phone and my laptop, and listen to great music. The sound quality is impressive in such an economic pair of headphones. For now, it seems the battery life is also pretty good. So far I have listened four different times for a total of about 2 hours on a single charge (over 2 days). The noise cancellation feature is ok. The headphones fit comfortable over the ear and the small wire connecting the L and R does not bother me. Highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod and Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great phones for the price, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I use these phones primarily when I'm working out. The earhooks keep them in place well. Battery life is good, but seems to decrease over time sooner than I expected. Sound is better than earphones I've used in the past - better than I expected for the price. My phones stopped working after about 10 months - they wouldn't charge and couldn't be powered up. I contacted Mpow tech support. They suggested a few things to try, but none worked. In our email exchanges, they always responded within no more than a day or two. When their suggestions didn't help, they sent me a new pair of earphones. That's how support should work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound crackles and cuts out frequently
customer_reviews.text: They are less than a month old and they are already starting to crackle and completely cut in and out all the time. I bought these to replace an old pair of Mpows that finally bit the dust after over a year of heavy use. I really liked the old ones and they lasted a long time. I thought the updated version would be just as durable but I was definitely wrong. I have to replace them after less than 30 days....but I will definitely NOT be buying another Mpow. They are making the new version much cheaper than before and they just won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fall out!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY satisfied with these earphones. They stay in my ears for vigorous exercise. They are easy for pairing. Sound quality is FINE especially for their CHEAP price. Stereo sound. These are a GREAT option for general videos, phone calls, running, dance/exercise. They do NOT cancel noise out which is what I want. I want to hear my surroundings. I've only had them for a week and have had no issues. Again, not a HIGH quality sound option but VERY good for price and the ONLY buds I've had that don't fall out of my ears. I wear glasses and have NO issue with wearing both.
customer_reviews.author: mstreedancer

customer_reviews.title: Technically similar to Beats Powerbeats
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned these long enough to have a real opinion. They strike me as a re-branded earbud that is the same thing that Beats uses to make their Powerbeats3 based earbuds, but at a much much lower price? Regardless, my Beats were garbage in longevity and support (Apple claimed that they could not give me support for an unrecognized serial), and while I could take them to a store and argue, that isn't the experience I paid. At least with these, I am getting what I pay for? Paying $30 for MPOW vs. $130 for Beats works for me. Time will tell how long these last.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch Hasues

customer_reviews.title: Great sound , noise cancelling works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the Mpow headphones on February 27. The Mpow's are more comfortable than I thought the would. One good thing that could be a bad thing is the noise cancelling works really well. It works so well that I don't use them when hiking or walking in a crowded urban area. They block sound so well it's hard to be aware of your surroundings. They are perfect for lounging at the beach and doing yard work. The sound quality is about what you would expect from headphones in this price range. The mechanics that hold them in your ears is well designed. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Happyguy

customer_reviews.title: Very low volume
customer_reviews.text: Defective product, Highest volume setting is only so-so, Returned two of this item hoping 1st was a fluke, Recommendation = DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Clave

customer_reviews.title: Ear Plugs that STAY put
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable ear plugs, just needed to switch out the ear tips to get the proper fit (I liked the memory foam tip) Sound Is very good, just need the correct tip for fit and best sound quality (snug tip = good bass) Battery life is great, range seems good, money well spent! Modified/shortened the connecting wire (see image) to fit snugly around my head, like swim goggles, eliminating the aggravation of the dangling cord pulling every time I turned my head. Just bought another pair for backup down the road, as nothing lasts forever, as all of us divorced folks know...Lol
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered had a distinct light static noise so I returned them for my money and bought a pair of their 🎧. Customer service reached out to me months later to say how sorry they were that I got a defective pair so they sent me another pair to try. I’m a tech person and my unbiased opinion is they are pretty nice. Changing the ear cushions made a nice fit they’re light I don’t hear what anyone is doing around me and they don’t hurt my ears after an hour. Using my smart quick charger it charged a little under 2 hours. I’d give MPOW a try again
customer_reviews.author: David Evans

customer_reviews.title: I liked but I've moved on
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 3/9/20 customer service reached out and sent me another pair without me even having to ask .I appreciate that especially knowing that's a penny a dozen type customer service. Didn't take much on my part at all. Definitely a 5 star attitude to say the least thank you Battery life's great but I've bought new earphones since I can't get consistent sound from these ,they basically whisper to me no lie shouldve sent them back but I hate waiting so whatever take my money merry Christmas. if I would have rated them in the first two weeks I had them .I might have given 5 stars .I'm glad I wait a long time to write these tho.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Dead after one month..
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review..I need to stop doing reviews so early and wait..anyway, now I can’t even get the things to turn on..only had them about a month...I liked them...when they were working..I will contact the company and see how they handle this...and will update again Update 5/29/20 Don’t know what the issue was but I was gonna return these and decided to try once more and for whatever reason they have been working good..use them all the time...work nice when sitting in the jacuzzi...they also hold a charge for a long time
customer_reviews.author: feenoh

customer_reviews.title: Little more room, whole lot more boom
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and very comfortable. The memory foam ear tips are easy to clean and fit snugly. Very little hanging weight is felt compared to some of the older models from Mpow and Soundpeats (they are all basically the same). The angle really does give a sense of having the weight moving away from the ears in a comfortable way . I have not yet worn them to battery completion but have gone for four hours without issue. Sync was seamless and the controls work efficiently. I wear them while sitting in the hot tub and having water splash all around without any problems. All in all, a great set of heaphones that are worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: John Kubler IV

customer_reviews.title: Earphones that actually stay in your ear!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several earphone/ear buds with the same result, they wouldn't stay in my ear. This earbud/headphone actually stay's in my ear. The second function I like is the sound. The sound quality is great. I also like that the sound +/- is really easy to find by feel and change. I need to get used to these a bit more but right now I can only get them in my ear if I am looking in a mirror. I'm not sure why as I've never had that issue before but once they're in, they stay in! I would recommend 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: These will work
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for what they are and for the price. I like that the Bluetooth part sticks out of the ear a bit to push out the proximity of the Bluetooth radiation exposure. The sound is not as crisp as I would like, but the bass is good. Still good enough for listening to music occasionally while working around the house. I usually use them for listening to yoga videos while following along with the yoga poses. No problems with the earbuds falling out! At first I thought they were uncomfortable, but when I changed the tip to the memory foam I found a happy medium.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had great experiences with MPow headphones but these were just terrible. They are so big and bulky and are the most uncomfortable pair of earbuds I've ever worn. I used these for about a month and bought a different pair. Sounds great and battery is fine, but they don't stay on well and are not comfortable even when they do.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice for MS Teams or Zoom mtgs
customer_reviews.text: Buy these if you're looking for a solid bluetooth headset. Since I started working from home I wanted a wireless headset. These last about 12 hrs. I use them for about 6 hrs a day in MS Teams. I charge them every 2 days. Colleges say the mic sound quality has no issues and I can hear very well. The only con if I had to name one is I had to get use too hearing myself speak in the muffled tone. After a week I stopped noticing it though. Def. Recommend this for work meeting at home using teams or zoom.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I’m soooo excited. I ordered this headset to replace an older set that was broken. I tried the iPods and hated them so I was very skeptical about these. To my surprise they are exactly what I’ve been looking for. They look beautiful. Ordered the pink ones to match my cell phone case. The ear piece is soft and comfortable and The battery last a long time. I work 12 hour shifts and I can listen to music at least half of my shift when things slow down with no problems very clear sounds and a lasting battery is a double winner.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: High quality headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Bluetooth headphones. They automatically connect with my iPhone and MacBook at the same time which was not something I expected... but I thought was so cool! Sound quality is excellent for listening to music and battery life was great. I believe they have some noise cancelling feature for phone calls. I use it to make/take calls for work during the weekday and then listening to audio books while working around the house on weekends! Highly recommended as it is also priced way cheaper than the name brand alternatives. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and long lasting battery.
customer_reviews.text: These fell into the water in my pool. It muffled the sound for a little bit and then went back to normal. I wear these all day while working, and sweating profusely, and they have lasted eight hours. The only thing is that I have lost the rubber tips on the ear pieces that go into your ear. Somehow they have fallen off a few different times, I wish I could just buy replacements for those. I think it's my fault they fell off though when I yank them. I have apple airpods too and prefer wearing these when I workout and move around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Keri L.

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for the price. Just buy them and thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the first mpow flames and an even better value. I wear headphones all day at work and the battery lasts through an entire shift no problem. They're also good enough at noise isolation that when I'm doing work in factories or manufacturing facilities I use them instead of ear plugs. The microphone is also solid and will use an earbud if I need to talk while driving. The Bluetooth range is improved over the first generation They are hands down the best headphones for the price. They stay on your ear, and help me enjoy my work day, time at the gym, and help me be a safer person. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: They Have Different Size Ear Rubbers To Fit All Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I Just Had My Pacemaker Implanted And Was Told I Have To Use My Phone On My Right Side, So I Purchased MPOW Headphones To Keep From Accidentally Using My Phone On My Left, I Was A Leery At First But After My First, Second, Third Use I’m Soooo In Love With Them I Go For Walks While Listening To My Music With My MPOW Ear Phones And They Block Out All Noise, I Talk And I Can Hear Clearly, So YES They Are Great Plus If You Activate Your Warranty You Get Free 2 Years Thanks For Reading My Review Hope It Helps Have A Blessed Day
customer_reviews.author: Suzy A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Bluetooth quality
customer_reviews.text: Tried these for a week now, 2 runs, and countless walks. Not sure if this is just the one I got, but the Bluetooth quality seems incredibly low. These headphones worked super well while running - arms up - and listening to podcasts/music (connected to a garmin smart watch), but every time my arms were down (walking position), the connection was breaking (due to "non line of sight" to the headphones I suppose). Always wondering how a product can get almost 5 stars and the first I order is not worth 2... Are people expectations super low because of the low price? Should "inexpensive" always mean "poor quality"? Sending those back.
customer_reviews.author: Vincebenny

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, not bad at all..
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pair of headphones quick for a long trip. So, I went with Amazon's pick. Ordered Mpow Flame2 Bluetooth Headphones Sport, 12Hrs & Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Sport Earphones, IPX7 Waterproof. I have a portable battery and I'm constnly charging my divices at anytime I can. So, I can't tell you how long these headphones would last without charging. Nor, can I tell you anything about how waterproof they are! Because, we didn't have any bad weather on our trip! I can tell you talking on the phone was clear. Listining to music was always loud enough for me. These headphones definitely did the job I purchased them for...
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for! My old ones always fell out & made my ear sore as many times as I had to keep putting it back in. These wrap around your ear & have an anchor to go up against your ear to keep it in place. The inside fits perfect & is comfortable. The battery life is incredible & the sound is amazing! The controls on the ear piece are very user friendly. The only con I have is that the "rose gold" color is more of a dull gray. But, it's a great product & I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: tltovey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the regular Mpow flame at the same time. I prefer the fit of these to the regular flame as the sit better and don’t move while I’m working. While I haven’t gotten these as wet as I have the original Flame these still function perfectly having seen plenty of sweat and rain. The sound of the Mpow flame 2 is a bit better than the original Mpow flame as it’s less bassy and has more high side clarity. In conclusion I can say that so far both these Mpow Flame 2 and the Mpow Flame are excellent excellent value for money, and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest Wireless Earphones
customer_reviews.text: So here's the deal. If you're looking for cheap earphones, you'll be happy. The amount of distance that you cn be from the source (eg: your phone or tablet) is not very far. With my other Zeus earphones, I could travel into the next room and still hear perfectly fine. I travel 6 feet away from my phone or PC and I start to get static and lose reception. This is with the latest Bluetooth also.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Riddell

product_meta.title: Mpow FLAME2 Bluetooth Headphones Sport, 12Hrs & Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Sport Earphones, IPX7 Waterproof Bluetooth Headset W/CVC 6.0 Noise Cancelling Mic, Bluetooth Earphones w/Comfort-Slanting, Green
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueGrey

Bring Music Where You Sweat
Thanks to the IPX7 sweatproof rating, Mpow sports earbuds keeps the headphones protected and in peak condition whether you’re getting drenched in sweat after a grueling workout.

True High Definition Sound
Drawing on extensive research and development, Mpow headphones features stereo sound with high definition and unparalleled rock-solid bass. Let your favorite songs drive you forward. 

Always Stay Comfortable
Ergonomic and shallow in-ear design, soft silicone ear hooks, and memory foam ear tips brings secure fit without hurting your ear, enables comfortable wearing experience.

Portable Gym-ready Carrying Pouch & Cord clip 
Come with an EVA bag with cushioned interior which allows you to store your earbuds safely and prevent the scratches in your training routine. The cord clip can shorten the wire to fit your back neck or head, because the long wire may bother your move and cause stethoscope effect.

Note:
(1) Please keep your headphone charged when in low battery life to achieve better Bluetooth connection and protect your battery.
(2) Please choose suitable ear tips and wear your headphone tightly when you are running or cycling, it will help you reduce the annoying wind noise.

Warranty
Every Mpow product includes a 45 days money back & 18-month warranty.

Specifications:
Bluetooth Standard: V4.1
Wireless Profile: Headset, Handsfree, A2DP, AVRCP
Operating Range: 10m (33ft)
Standby Time: 220hrs
Charging Time: 1.5hrs
Talk /Playing Time: 7hrs
Charging Voltage: DC 5V
Battery Capacity: 100mAh/3.7V

Package Contents:
Mpow Earphonex 1
Regular Ear Tips(S, M, L) x 3 Pairs
Memory Foam Ear Tipsx 1 Pair 
Cord clip x 1
EVA Carrying Casex 1
Charging Cablex 1
feature_bullets: HD Bass Sound: With well tuned driver, advanced CSR chip and Bluetooth 4.1 technology, Mpow flame sport earbuds produce richer bass stereo sound with reinforced clarity, as well as faster pairing and enhanced wireless connection

Long-lasting 7-9 Hours Playtime: Powerful battery offers 7-9 Hours of superior audio performance or hands-free phone conversation after charging for just 1.5 Hours. (Note: 1. Mpow flame has 12V over-voltage hardware cut off, 1a over-current restored fuse to achieve safe charging. 2. Please use charging cable provided, or certified brand charging cable. 3. We don't recommend using fast charging.)

IPX7 Waterproof Headphones: Mpow flame wireless headphones have reliable water & sweat-proof Nano-coating for worry-free use and improved durability in intense workouts or exercises in light rain. Perfect for running, jogging, hiking, yoga, exercises, gym, fitness, traveling and etc

Enhanced Comfort & Secure Fit: Four different sizes of eartips (XS, S, M, L), one memory foam eartip and one optional wire clip are included for different ear canals and necks. A carrying case is provided for better portability. (Note: Please choose the most suitable eartips for your ears.)

CVC 6.0 Noise Cancelling Mic: With built-in CVC 6.0 noise canceling microphone, Mpow flame bluetooth headphones offer crystal clear sound quantity for hands-free calling. 18 Month Warranty: Every Mpow product includes a 45 days money-back guarantee & 18-month warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars11,592 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
